transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .contain{background-color:#f8f7fa;float:right;margin-top:77.6px;min-height:calc(100vh - 77.6px);overflow-x:hidden;padding:16px;transition:all .3s linear;width:100%}@media (max-width:600px){.contain{margin-top:55px}}.contain.shrink{width:calc(100% - 260px)}@media (max-width:600px){.contain.shrink{width:100%}}.contain .title-container{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin:16px 0}@media (max-width:991px){.contain .title-container{align-items:flex-start;flex-direction:column}}.contain .title-container .head-title p{color:#6d6a77;font-size:15px}.contain .title-container .head-title p a{color:#19ad7b;text-decoration:underline}.contain .form .main-info,.contain .form .second-info{background-color:#fff;block-size:100%;padding:25px}.contain .form .main-info h5,.contain .form .second-info h5{margin:16px 0}.contain .form .second-info .circles{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;margin-bottom:20px}.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle{align-items:center;border:2px solid transparent;cursor:pointer;display:flex;height:33px;justify-content:center;margin:2px;width:33px}.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle.active{border:2px solid #19ad7b}.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle span{align-items:center;border:1px solid #c5c5c5;display:flex;font-size:13px;height:25px;justify-content:center;width:25px}.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle.colors,.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle.colors span{border-radius:50%}.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle.sizes,.contain .form .second-info .circles .circle.sizes span{border-radius:6px}.contain .uplod-image{background-color:#fff;block-size:100%;padding:25px}.contain .uplod-image h5{margin:16px 0}.contain .category-price{background-color:#fff;block-size:100%;padding:25px}.contain .category-price h5{margin:16px 0}.contain .category-price .custom-select{align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-bottom:10px;position:relative}.contain .category-price .custom-select select{appearance:none;-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;background-color:#f1f1f1;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:5px;cursor:pointer;font-size:16px;margin-right:10px;outline:none;padding:10px 20px;width:100%}.contain .category-price .custom-select select::-ms-expand{display:none}.contain .category-price .custom-select select:focus{border-color:#19ad7b;box-shadow:0 0 5px rgba(25,173,123,.5)}.contain .category-price .custom-select .plus-icon{background-color:#19ad7b}.contain .category-price .custom-select .delete-cat,.contain .category-price .custom-select .plus-icon{align-items:center;border-radius:6px;color:#fff;cursor:pointer;display:flex;font-size:20px;height:45px;justify-content:center;padding:10px;width:45px}.contain .category-price .custom-select .delete-cat{background-color:#d83845}label svg{margin-inline-end:5px}.drop-area{position:relative}.drop-area .p-fileupload{z-index:2}.drop-area img{-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;position:absolute;z-index:1}.clear{inset-inline-end:0;margin:10px;position:absolute;top:0;z-index:2}
